table_description: GitHub Licenses are common software licenses that you can associate with your repository.

columns.name: spdx_id
columns.description: The Software Package Data Exchange (SPDX) id of the license.

columns.name: url
columns.description: The HTML URL of the license.

columns.name: conditions
columns.description: An array of license conditions (include-copyright,disclose-source, etc).

columns.name: featured
columns.description: If true, the license is 'featured' in the GitHub UI.

columns.name: hidden
columns.description: Whether the license should be displayed in license pickers.

columns.name: key
columns.description: The unique key of the license.

columns.name: limitations
columns.description: An array of limitations for the license (trademark-use, liability,warranty, etc).

columns.name: permissions
columns.description: An array of permissions for the license (private-use, commercial-use,modifications, etc).

columns.name: nickname
columns.description: The customary short name of the license.

columns.name: pseudo_license
columns.description: Indicates if the license is a pseudo-license placeholder (e.g. other, no-license).
